Function reference

All functions

climatology()
Compute climatology of grid data for a extension area of a shapefile basin, with the possibility of creating a graph of the climatology and exporting a GIF.
donwload_SOILDGRIDS()
Download SOILGRIDS datasets V2 for a roi area.
download_CHIRPS()
Function to download CHIRPS raster data global on daily and monthly scales.
download_CMORPH()
Function to download CMORPH raster data global on daily sacale at 25km.
download_PISCO()
Download PISCO grid daily and monthly data and subsetting for a basin extend.#'
download_RAIN4PE()
Download available data for PERÚ at 0.1 x 0.1 resolution of grid and subsetting to a roi area if require.
download_SM2RAIN()
Function to download SM2RAIN global netcdf datasets on daily sacale.
download_TERRACLIMATE()
Download 14 climatic variables simultaneously from the TERRACLIMATE database at 4km resolution.
get_codes()
Function to get codes of senamhi water stations.
get_ITPA_SENAMHI()
Obtain information from SENAMHI on Advanced Thermo-Pluviometric information from existing stations, this information is available from 2011 to the present. You can quickly generate an Exploratory Data Analysis for the entire requested data set.
get_SENAMHI_data()
Get information from multiple station and variables from Servicio Nacional de Meteorología e Hidrológia del Perú (SENAMHI).
grid2RSMinerve()
Function extracts grid data from climate raster bricks and make a database table for later import in RSMinerve platform.
grid_pcp2SWAT()
Function to extract Precipitation grid data from daily and make inputs for SWAT model
grid_tas2SWAT()
Function to extract Temperature grid data from daily and make inputs for SWAT model
stations2RSMinerve()
Converter you excel sheets data of gauge time series into data base .csv for reading as input into RS Minerve platform for modelling.
stations_ITPA_SENAMHI()
Get the available stations filter by year(s) for use in the function get_ITPA_SENAMHI.
subsetting_CMORPH.nc()
Function to subset CMORPH raster data to a roi extension.
subsseting_TERRACLIMATE()
Function to subset and aggregate TERRACLIMATE netcdfs and exported the stack as tif.

Developed by Crhistian Cornejo.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.6.
